scripts.setup: npm install -g bower dtsm http-server peer coffee-script watchify
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; dtsm fetch; dtsm update --save
scripts.start: http-server -o --silent -p 8000 & peerjs --port 9000 --debug & watchify lib/index.js --standalone duxca -o dist/duxca.lib.js -v & coffee -c -w -o lib src/coffee/*.coffee & gulp watch
scripts.build-md: cd ./doc/md; for i in `find . -name '*.md'`; do node ../../node_modules/markdown/bin/md2html.js $i > ../html/$i.html; done
scripts.build-html:
cd ./doc/html; for i in `find . -name '*.md.html'`; do echo "<html>
<head>
<meta charset='utf-8'>
<script type='text/x-mathjax-config'>MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: { inlineMath: [['$','$'], ['\(','\)']] } });</script>
<script src='https://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS_HTML'>
</script>
</head>
<body>
$(cat $i)
</body>
</html>" > "$i"; done
